creator: Sophia Flores
title: Squad unhinged: AOC changes subject during Omar removal
dc:creator: Sophia Flores
content: Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez attacked Republicans on the House floor. The New York congresswoman shared strong words on her thoughts of the dismissing of Representative Ilhan Omar from the House Foreign Affairs Committee.
contentSnippet: Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez attacked Republicans on the House floor. The New York congresswoman shared strong words on her thoughts of the dismissing of Representative Ilhan Omar from the House Foreign Affairs Committee.

creator: Sophia Flores
title: Speaker McCarthy: Congress to probe Hunter Biden’s laptop
dc:creator: Sophia Flores
content: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy has responded to Hunter Biden over his call for criminal investigations against anyone who discussed his laptop scandal.
contentSnippet: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy has responded to Hunter Biden over his call for criminal investigations against anyone who discussed his laptop scandal.

creator: Sophia Flores
title: Biden’s Air Force won’t pop Chinese Balloon
dc:creator: Sophia Flores
content: The Pentagon has announced that it is tracking a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon.
contentSnippet: The Pentagon has announced that it is tracking a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon.

creator: Roy Frances
title: John Kerry faces probe about secret negotiations
dc:creator: Roy Frances
content: House Oversight and Accountability Committee Chairman James Comer is investigating Special Presidential Envoy for Climate (SPEC) John Kerry’s secretive negotiations with China.
contentSnippet: House Oversight and Accountability Committee Chairman James Comer is investigating Special Presidential Envoy for Climate (SPEC) John Kerry’s secretive negotiations with China.

creator: Roy Frances
title: Arkansas governor chosen to deliver State of the Union rebuttal
dc:creator: Roy Frances
content: Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy announced on Thursday the person that will be delivering the State of the Union rebuttal on Tuesday February 7th, after the president gives his speech.
contentSnippet: Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy announced on Thursday the person that will be delivering the State of the Union rebuttal on Tuesday February 7th, after the president gives his speech.

creator: Roy Frances
title: Omar gets booted
dc:creator: Roy Frances
content: The House of Representatives has voted to remove Representative Ilhan Omar from the House Foreign Affairs Committee.
contentSnippet: The House of Representatives has voted to remove Representative Ilhan Omar from the House Foreign Affairs Committee.
